channel.title: [317] how to make a safezone/pvp zone? [317]
channel.description:
i want to make lumbridge a all pk box..was wondering if any1knew how to make this happen :) thanks!
been trying to figure this out for a while, so pease post and please help..thanks!

item.title: [317] how to make a safezone/pvp zone? [317]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“lukenuke75, post:2, topic:284236”]ok[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 03:22:27 pm[/size][hr]ok you know how nonwild looks…?
well after nonwild create a boolean public boolean nonsafe()
then after that insert somthinglike this

if ((absX >= COORDX && absX <= COORDX && absY >= COORDY && absY <= COORDY))

i put the COORDX and Y becasue those are your ranges so Sset your first coordx to what you want the abse of the pvp area to be and then the other coordX is the ending point and do the same with y but with ys first one put the y pos were you ended with x.

did i help you at all?[/quote]

w00t have varrok as 100% full pvp area <3 wud rep++ if i cud!

Read full topic
item.source: [317] how to make a safezone/pvp zone? [317]

item.title: [317] how to make a safezone/pvp zone? [317]
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

ok[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 03:22:27 pm[/size][hr]ok you know how nonwild looks…?
well after nonwild create a boolean public boolean nonsafe()
then after that insert somthinglike this

if ((absX >= COORDX && absX <= COORDX && absY >= COORDY && absY <= COORDY))

i put the COORDX and Y becasue those are your ranges so Sset your first coordx to what you want the abse of the pvp area to be and then the other coordX is the ending point and do the same with y but with ys first one put the y pos were you ended with x.

did i help you at all?

Read full topic
